name: linked-data-registry
description: Standard Analytics IO registry for linked data packages

scripts.push: (cd registry && NODE_HOST=localhost NODE_PORT=3000 NODE_PORT_HTTPS=4000 REGISTRY_DB_NAME=registry INTERACTION_DB_NAME=interaction ../node_modules/.bin/couchapp push app.js http://seb:seb@127.0.0.1:5984/registry) && (cd owners && ../node_modules/.bin/couchapp push app.js http://seb:seb@127.0.0.1:5984/_users)
scripts.start: COUCH_SSL=0 COUCH_HOST=127.0.0.1 COUCH_PORT=5984 QUEUE_DB_NAME=cqs_queue REGISTRY_DB_NAME=registry INTERACTION_DB_NAME=interaction COUCH_USER=seb COUCH_PASS=seb NODE_HOST=localhost NODE_PORT=3000 NODE_PORT_HTTPS=4000 node proxy/app.js

author: Sebastien Ballesteros
